channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portable Runtime (APR)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portable Runtime (APR)

item.title: CVE-2022-24963|2024-08-03T04:29:01.595Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20portable%20runtime%20%28apr%29
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_encode functions of Apache Portable Runtime (APR) allows an attacker to write beyond bounds of a buffer. This issue affects Apache Portable Runtime (APR) version 1.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2022-28331|2024-08-03T05:56:14.939Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20portable%20runtime%20%28apr%29
item.description: On Windows, Apache Portable Runtime 1.7.0 and earlier may write beyond the end of a stack based buffer in apr_socket_sendv(). This is a result of integer overflow.
